title: Mesmeric crisis & quantum hypnosis / Dr. Paret's non-verbal hypnosis school
description:
At Dr. Marco Paret's masterclasses, his students get to experience and learn the most unique and powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques. They induced mesmeric crisis, using quantum hypnosis. The subject entered in a hypnotic induction, followed by the strong liberating reaction of his body. Waking up they feel deeply transformed. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
